ProductInfo.Features:
18.0MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, ISO 100-12800, Expandable to 25600 and DIGIC 5 Image Processor for high speed and excellent image quality
3.0" Vari-angle touch screen LCD flips out and tilts for viewing from a wide variety of angles. Operation is highly intuitive and allows you to control your focus points from the LCD
9-Point All Cross-Type AF System and Full HD Movie Mode with Continuous AF for shooting photos and videos in Live Mode
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS and a Deluxe Accessory Bundle
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital SLR Camera Body with 3 Lens Kit: Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS + Wide Angle & Telephoto Lenses + UV Filter + Tripod + 16 GB & Deluxe Accessory Bundle
